trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot a deployed StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot a deployed StorSimple device | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Describes how to diagnose and fix errors that occur on a StorSimple device that is currently deployed and operational.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to diagnose and fix errors that occur on a StorSimple device that is currently deployed and operational.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot an operational StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot an operational StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This article provides helpful troubleshooting guidance for resolving configuration issues that you might encounter after your StorSimple device is deployed and operational.
trans-unit.target: This article provides helpful troubleshooting guidance for resolving configuration issues that you might encounter after your StorSimple device is deployed and operational.

trans-unit.source: It describes common issues, possible causes, and recommended steps to help you resolve problems that you might experience when you run Microsoft Azure StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: It describes common issues, possible causes, and recommended steps to help you resolve problems that you might experience when you run Microsoft Azure StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: This information applies to both the StorSimple on-premises physical device and the StorSimple virtual device.
trans-unit.target: This information applies to both the StorSimple on-premises physical device and the StorSimple virtual device.

trans-unit.source: At the end of this article you can find a list of error codes that you might encounter during Microsoft Azure StorSimple operation, as well as steps you can take to resolve the errors.
trans-unit.target: At the end of this article you can find a list of error codes that you might encounter during Microsoft Azure StorSimple operation, as well as steps you can take to resolve the errors.

trans-unit.source: Setup wizard process for operational devices
trans-unit.target: Setup wizard process for operational devices

trans-unit.source: You use the setup wizard ([Invoke-HcsSetupWizard][1]) to check the device configuration and take corrective action if necessary.
trans-unit.target: You use the setup wizard ([Invoke-HcsSetupWizard][1]) to check the device configuration and take corrective action if necessary.

trans-unit.source: When you run the setup wizard on a previously configured and operational device, the process flow is different.
trans-unit.target: When you run the setup wizard on a previously configured and operational device, the process flow is different.

trans-unit.source: You can change only the following entries:
trans-unit.target: You can change only the following entries:

trans-unit.source: IP address, subnet mask, and gateway
trans-unit.target: IP address, subnet mask, and gateway

trans-unit.source: Primary DNS server
trans-unit.target: Primary DNS server

trans-unit.source: Primary NTP server
trans-unit.target: Primary NTP server

trans-unit.source: Optional web proxy configuration
trans-unit.target: Optional web proxy configuration

trans-unit.source: The setup wizard does not perform the operations related to password collection and device registration.
trans-unit.target: The setup wizard does not perform the operations related to password collection and device registration.

trans-unit.source: Errors that occur during subsequent runs of the setup wizard
trans-unit.target: Errors that occur during subsequent runs of the setup wizard

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the errors that you might encounter when you run the setup wizard on an operational device, possible causes for the errors, and recommended actions to resolve them.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the errors that you might encounter when you run the setup wizard on an operational device, possible causes for the errors, and recommended actions to resolve them.

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: No.

trans-unit.source: Error message or condition
trans-unit.target: Error message or condition

trans-unit.source: Possible causes
trans-unit.target: Possible causes

trans-unit.source: Recommended action
trans-unit.target: Recommended action

trans-unit.source: Error 350032: This device has already been deactivated.
trans-unit.target: Error 350032: This device has already been deactivated.

trans-unit.source: You will see this error if you run the setup wizard on a device that is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: You will see this error if you run the setup wizard on a device that is deactivated.

trans-unit.source: [Contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for next steps.
trans-unit.target: [Contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for next steps.

trans-unit.source: A deactivated device cannot be put in service.
trans-unit.target: A deactivated device cannot be put in service.

trans-unit.source: A factory reset may be required before the device can be activated again.
trans-unit.target: A factory reset may be required before the device can be activated again.

trans-unit.source: Invoke-HcsSetupWizard : ERROR_INVALID_FUNCTION(Exception from HRESULT: 0x80070001)
trans-unit.target: Invoke-HcsSetupWizard : ERROR_INVALID_FUNCTION(Exception from HRESULT: 0x80070001)

trans-unit.source: The DNS server update is failing.
trans-unit.target: The DNS server update is failing.

trans-unit.source: DNS settings are global settings and are applied across all the enabled network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: DNS settings are global settings and are applied across all the enabled network interfaces.

trans-unit.source: Enable the interface and apply the DNS settings again.
trans-unit.target: Enable the interface and apply the DNS settings again.

trans-unit.source: This may disrupt the network for other enabled interfaces because these settings are global.
trans-unit.target: This may disrupt the network for other enabled interfaces because these settings are global.

trans-unit.source: The device appears to be online in the StorSimple Manager service portal, but when you try to complete the minimum setup and save the configuration, the operation fails.
trans-unit.target: The device appears to be online in the StorSimple Manager service portal, but when you try to complete the minimum setup and save the configuration, the operation fails.

trans-unit.source: During initial setup, the web proxy was not configured, even though there was an actual proxy server in place.
trans-unit.target: During initial setup, the web proxy was not configured, even though there was an actual proxy server in place.

trans-unit.source: Use the [Test-HcsmConnection cmdlet][2] to locate the error.
trans-unit.target: Use the [Test-HcsmConnection cmdlet][2] to locate the error.

trans-unit.source: [Contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) if you are unable to correct the problem.
trans-unit.target: [Contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) if you are unable to correct the problem.

trans-unit.source: Invoke-HcsSetupWizard: Value does not fall within the expected range.
trans-unit.target: Invoke-HcsSetupWizard: Value does not fall within the expected range.

trans-unit.source: An incorrect subnet mask produces this error.
trans-unit.target: An incorrect subnet mask produces this error.

trans-unit.source: Possible causes are:
trans-unit.target: Possible causes are:

trans-unit.source: The subnet mask is missing or empty.
trans-unit.target: The subnet mask is missing or empty.

trans-unit.source: The Ipv6 prefix format is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: The Ipv6 prefix format is incorrect.

trans-unit.source: The interface is cloud-enabled, but the gateway is missing or incorrect.
trans-unit.target: The interface is cloud-enabled, but the gateway is missing or incorrect.

trans-unit.source: Note that DATA 0 is automatically cloud-enabled if configured through the setup wizard.
trans-unit.target: Note that DATA 0 is automatically cloud-enabled if configured through the setup wizard.

trans-unit.source: To determine the problem, use subnet 0.0.0.0 or 256.256.256.256, and then look at the output.
trans-unit.target: To determine the problem, use subnet 0.0.0.0 or 256.256.256.256, and then look at the output.

trans-unit.source: Enter correct values for the subnet mask, gateway, and Ipv6 prefix, as needed.
trans-unit.target: Enter correct values for the subnet mask, gateway, and Ipv6 prefix, as needed.

trans-unit.source: Error codes
trans-unit.target: Error codes

trans-unit.source: Errors are listed in numeric order.
trans-unit.target: Errors are listed in numeric order.

trans-unit.source: Error Number
trans-unit.target: Error Number

trans-unit.source: Error text or description
trans-unit.target: Error text or description

trans-unit.source: Recommended user action
trans-unit.target: Recommended user action

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered while accessing your storage account.
trans-unit.target: An error was encountered while accessing your storage account.

trans-unit.source: Wait for a few minutes and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Wait for a few minutes and then try again.

trans-unit.source: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: Unable to resolve a disk in a backup set.
trans-unit.target: Unable to resolve a disk in a backup set.

trans-unit.source: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: Unable to resolve any of the disks in backup set.
trans-unit.target: Unable to resolve any of the disks in backup set.

trans-unit.source: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: The system is busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: The system is busy or unavailable.

trans-unit.source: Wait for a few minutes and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Wait for a few minutes and then try again.

trans-unit.source: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the error persists, please Contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: An error has occurred with error code 390143.
trans-unit.target: An error has occurred with error code 390143.

trans-unit.source: (Unknown error.)
trans-unit.target: (Unknown error.)

trans-unit.source: If the error persists, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the error persists, please contact Microsoft Support for next steps.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: If you are unable to resolve the problem, [contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for assistance.
trans-unit.target: If you are unable to resolve the problem, [contact Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for assistance.
